title: Why was Sam Altmanâ€™s Worldcoin banned in Spain?
description: Spain recently hit Worldcoin, the cryptocurrency venture owned by Sam Altman, with a ban, insisting the project stop its unique method of gathering personal data through an eye-scanning device dubbed “the orb”. This action by the AEPD, Spain’s watchdog for data protection, is a decisive move against Worldcoin’s operations within the nation. The regulator’s ultimatum […]
